name: Said Barre
spouse: Khadija Maalin, Dalayad Haji Hashi , Fadumo Aw Muse, Falhado Gura, Maryan Hassan
battles: Second Italo-Ethiopian War, East African Campaign (World War II), 1964 Ethiopian-Somali Border War, Shifta War, Ogaden War, 1982 Ethiopian-Somali Border War, Somali Rebellion, Somali Civil War
order2: 2nd Commander in Chief of the Somali Armed Forces
